title: Gnar's Promo Site Gone?
body:
There used to be a site with cave paintings that showed Gnar's backstory but now it seems to be gone. All the links that led to it only take me to a news page. 

Is the site gone for good? Is there anywhere else I can look up his lore info?

replies.body: Yep I looked on his page. the link takes me to the news page.

Weird, that exact link takes me to his universe page with all the art and sketches. Try [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) to see if that helps, or trying to load that page in a completely different browser?

I apologize. I worded my last reply very confusingly. Yes I can reach his universe page just fine. But the link on his universe page (the link for Gnar's promo site) is the link that is a dead end. I can reach his Universe page but I'm trying to find the promo site.

So sorry about that confusion xD! Tbh I really thought you were talking about the Universe page when you mentioned the promo site, I'm not really sure what promo site you're referring to. It might have been removed entirely if it seemed like a temporary promotion for his release or some kind of teaser.

Sorry bother you again... but is there anywhere else I might be able to find the content that was on the site?

Also is there any additional story info for Gnar that isn't on his universe page?

Sorry to ask all these questions.

No bother at all friendo ^_^! I've did some digging around and I can't seem to find the exact page you're talking about (honestly I can't even remember which one it would have been). 

I was able to find some extra lore-bits over on the Gnar reddit that I didn't even know myself!
https://www.reddit.com/r/GnarMains/comments/5fkxy2/gnars_family_and_a_bit_about_lore/
I appreciate that very much. thank you! Is there anywhere else I can look fro more info on him? Or just googleing around the web?

I think all of the info you'd want on him (that we still have) would still be on that universe page. Anything else I think you might wanna check out that Gnar Subreddit for, really sorry I couldn't find much else for you 

{{sticker:sg-janna}}

Okay I was hoping I could find more about him but thank you so much for time and for answering my questions for me!

He's a character that has really helped me cope with a tough year so I'm really glad you guys made him!  Also I'd really love to see any new story updates that are released for him!
Were you just looking for more in-depth lore or something else specific? I'm more than happy to do a little more digging to help out however I can ^_^
I'd love more indepth lore if there is any available!  I've looked at his Universe page. I don't know if there's anything other then that available...

Sorry to be confusing. ^^;

Yeah his universe page is working no issues. I just can't reach the the promo site which makes me sad because I really wanted to know more about his story.
